page.content: The majority of the people speak{Welsh although the number of English and non Welsh speaking immigrants is increasing annually.This effects the percentage of Welsh speakers in the area. Every child which leaves Pentrecelyn Primary School is {bilingual,and out of the 97 children} at school 60 hear Welsh at home.This is{61.1%. The local population(i.e. those who have lived here for generations) are all Welsh speakers.The field names and farm names are all in Welsh. What will be spoken here in 2085?
